up to .html

or

http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com and search for bongos (upper
left search box) if they're not still the top post.



Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT:  tiny urls was Re: site news: peace-spouses-museum-bongos
messages.msgSnippet: ... http://tinyurl.com They provide you with a custom link (on their main page) to add to your browser s toolbar.  When you are viewing a page that you want to
messages.messageBody:
> Thank you, and what the heck is a "tiny" url, and how do you make
> one? (--cause that seems really useful)

http://tinyurl.com

They provide you with a custom link (on their main page) to add to
your browser's toolbar. When you are viewing a page that you want to
convert you then click on the special TinyURL link and a short link
will be created for the page you were just viewing.

Mahalo,
Barbara

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
